exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.description: A great exercise to strengthen your calves by lifting your heels to engage your calf muscles.

exercises.name: Machine Abductions
exercises.description: Targets the abductor muscles in your hips, helping to improve hip stability and strength.

exercises.name: Lying/Seated Leg Curl
exercises.description: Focuses on your hamstrings, helping to build strength and muscle mass in the back of your legs.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Squat
exercises.description: A compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes using a guided barbell.

exercises.name: Machine Hip Thrust
exercises.description: Isolates the glute muscles, helping to increase hip extension strength and power.

exercises.name: Glute Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.description: An advanced single-leg exercise that targets the glutes, quads, and hamstrings for balanced lower-body strength.

exercises.name: B-Stance Deadlift
exercises.description: A variation of the deadlift focusing on unilateral strength and stability in the hamstrings and glutes.

exercises.name: Preacher Curl
exercises.description: Isolates the biceps to ensure maximum contraction and growth during curls.

exercises.name: Military Press
exercises.description: A shoulder press exercise that targets the deltoids and triceps, performed while standing or sitting.

exercises.name: Incline Lateral Raise
exercises.description: Targets the lateral deltoids, enhancing shoulder width and definition.

exercises.name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.description: Focuses on the upper back muscles and lats, promoting unilateral strength and muscle balance.

exercises.name: Close-Grip Push-Ups
exercises.description: Emphasizes the triceps and inner chest, increasing upper-body strength.

exercises.name: Gironda Row
exercises.description: A variation of the bent-over row that targets the middle back, lats, and traps.

exercises.name: Cable Triceps Extension
exercises.description: Isolates the triceps for improved muscle growth and definition.

exercises.name: Bayesian Curl on Cable
exercises.description: Targets the biceps with constant tension, promoting peak contraction and muscle growth.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.description: Primarily targets the glutes and hamstrings, improving hip extension and lower back strength.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: A hamstring-dominant exercise that also works the glutes and lower back.

exercises.name: Lying/Seated Leg Curl
exercises.description: Focuses on your hamstrings, helping to build strength and muscle mass in the back of your legs.

exercises.name: Unilateral Pendulum Press
exercises.description: Targets the chest and shoulders, emphasizing unilateral strength and stability.

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.description: Isolates the quadriceps, helping to build muscle definition and strength.

exercises.name: Hyperextension on Bench
exercises.description: Targets the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings, improving posterior chain strength.

exercises.name: EZ Bar French Press
exercises.description: A triceps extension exercise that targets the long head of the triceps for better arm definition.

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.description: Targets the brachialis and forearms, promoting overall arm strength and muscle growth.

exercises.name: Machine Rear Delt Fly
exercises.description: Focuses on the rear deltoids, helping to improve shoulder stability and posture.

exercises.name: Neutral Grip Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: Targets the lats and upper back, promoting a V-shaped torso and back strength.

exercises.name: Chest-Supported Lateral Raise
exercises.description: Isolates the lateral deltoids, enhancing shoulder width and overall shoulder development.

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.description: Targets the mid-back, lats, and traps, improving back thickness and strength.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: Targets the upper chest and shoulders, promoting upper body strength and muscle balance.

exercises.name: Cable Rear Delt Lateral Raise
exercises.description: Isolates the rear deltoids, helping to improve shoulder stability and posture.

exercises.name: Low Row Machine
exercises.description: Focuses on the lower lats and mid-back, enhancing back thickness and overall strength.
